lead_paragraph: Scott Verplank made enough birdies on his first nine holes on the Magnolia Course in Lake Buena Vista, Fla., that he was not too bothered by closing with nine straight pars, giving him a second consecutive six-under-par 66 and a one-shot lead over Tag Ridings, Stephen Ames and Ryan Armour at the Children’s Miracle Network Classic.
